segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, the details are so sharp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, oblivious to the faucet gushing water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That overflow is disgusting, water everywhere like a flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and floor— what a nasty mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it, and she doesn't care; gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are raiding the cookie jar, but on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Climbing like that seems filthy with the wet floor nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in a kitchen that's turning into a swamp—yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching too, probably tracking dirt everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is just revolting, hazards and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden outside can't hide the interior sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching such unclean chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
